title: Gasperini: 'Roma won't settle for 4th, but we'd be happy with it'
snippet: ROME, ITALY – DECEMBER 15: Gian Piero Gasperini, Head Coach of AS Roma, hugs Cesc Fabregas, Head Coach of Como 1907, prior to the Serie A match between AS Roma and Como 1907 at Stadio Olimpico on December 15, 2025 in Rome, Italy.

title: AS Roma appoint Gian Piero Gasperini as new Head Coach
snippet: AS Roma announces the appointment of Gian Piero Gasperini as the Club’s new Head Coach.

title: Gasperini: “We’re improving, competing and have belief” - AS Roma
snippet: Gian Piero Gasperini was interviewed by Sky Sport after winning against Udinese. Here’s what our coach had to say. Roma’s performance was a solid one. They were very athletic and very focused on their marking. Some mistakes were made towards the end, but it was nevertheless a solid performance.

title: Gasperini: ‘Roma won’t settle for fourth, but we’d be happy with it’ - Yahoo Sports
snippet: Tue, December 16, 2025 at 1:30 a.m. UTC· ... Gian Piero Gasperini feels the 1-0 victory over Como was Roma’s ‘best home performance of the season’ and assures he wouldn’t ‘settle for fourth place, but I’d be very happy with it.’

title: Gasperini after Celtic 0-3 Roma: ‘It's never easy to win away, Ferguson needs patience'
snippet: GLASGOW, SCOTLAND - DECEMBER 11: ... AS Roma, arrives at the stadium prior to the UEFA Europa League 2025/26 League Phase MD6 match between Celtic FC and AS Roma at Celtic Park on December 11, 2025 in Glasgow, Scotland...
